name: Rutorial
body:
### Welcome to Cobbionator's Advanced Coding
Here you will apply your fundamental coding skills you learned earlier in your first semester of coding, and put it into practice.  

### Cloud9 and Django
Because Django is a, to put it lightly, unnecessarily complicated program to use, we will instead use Ruby on Rails--Rails for short.  (If you were to actually say Ruby on Rails to a real developer, they'd laugh at you.)  Within Cloud9, create a Rails workspace.  Generally, you'd have to run `ruby new name_here`, but Cloud9 does that for us.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
